1ot-ACiZmNbK1Ujty44Sbg.text: I know this is just a fast food place but you still have to hold your eating establishments to higher standards. More times than not I find the food to take  a while to get and the play area is DIRTY!

9moVzYVhc0EfZIkbTZBkgA.text: How is this location still in business?? Keep in mind this place currently has a 91 health rating. The edges of my hamburger bun were rock hard and the entire burger itself was lukewarm and clearly had been sitting under a warmer for who knows how long. It was inedible. Aside from the food, customer service is terrible. When I pulled up to the window, the cashier just held her hand out for my money. No words were ever spoken from her. I'm completely appalled with this location.

2Ky2IU0eV-9OuA-QdlXuCA.text: Waited for over 10 minutes for my order. They just brought it out and it's wrong. I'm writing the review while waiting. This is nuts. Oh and they were RUDE!

1wz63uI-6aSKpUDeq_ihBw.text: I am not the type of person to write a review but I was so astounded tonight that I felt the need to do so to hopefully see some change at this location. I just waited 30 minutes for a chicken nugget meal and received the worst customer service. The employee who finally opened the window to have me pay (Mind you, my food was sitting there for a good 15 minutes as I waited) didn't even apologize and was clearly not happy to be there. I explained to her that I too work in the business but was frustrated I had to wait so long and asked if she could at least give me a discount. I was given such poor attitude from her and eventually was met by the manager. The manager, Deborah, insisted I only waited 10 minutes when I could've easily shown her proof it was exactly 30 minutes by the time I was helped. A simple apology would have gone a long way. I was taken aback. If I were the owner of this location, I'd consider cleaning house or go back to square one and teach these employees what decent customer service means. This is not the first time I have waited an obscene amount or received poor customer service at this location and I don't see myself returning.

WrfFclITji7AgT4tUe5BPw.text: Key: Notice the dates on the reviews. This place was great but mismanaged into not so great. First thing to understand is that this is a fantastic location. The result is that they don't have to do it right to keep people coming in.  I went inside the restaurant to eat last Saturday at 5:45 pm. Immediately noticed the place was a dump. Trash everywhere. Even a seat cushion was ripped. (When was the last time you viewed a ripped seat cushion in a McDonald's?) I used the restroom - same thing - one hand dryer was busted. Gross.   But I thought, maybe they cater to the drive through and neglect the store? So I went ahead and ordered my food anyways (plus I had a coupon). Both my Big Mac and the 1/4 pounder came with stale buns. How is this possible at 5:45 pm on a Saturday night?  It's all the fault of the management - the sad part is that it used to be fine but now it's not. Also there is a Chick-a-filet a mile up the road that is awesome. Maybe that is where the management goes to eat?

JczJzp7b0jKzBa4IXq2-yQ.text: The service here is very, very poor. The place is dirty. I took a picture over the overflowing trash can inside the restaurant at 8:45 am on a Sunday. Consistently slow service. Every time I have been here the service is slow and the staff is at best confused and very indifferent. This morning the service is even worse. Many people are complaining about the wait, wrong orders, and unprofessional staff. One man even asked for a refund. This McDonald's needs a new franchise owner. Avoid this McDonald's unless you want slow service and a poor experience.

photos.caption: Photo of McDonald's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Trash overflows at McDonald&#39;s

PxjQ2Ue2Dk5fyZ6Wj6FCGg.text: Yet another McDonald's with a 24 hr sign that isn't A 24 HR LOCATION. Yet another POS.

E0ty-PeZzD9uMy0WwBmjkg.text: My family and I will not be returning anytime soon, the overall cleanliness and atmosphere is VERY POOR! It's really bad when you question whether or not you should take a shower after visiting this establishment! The staff looked as though they were less than thrilled to be there and the quality of the food and presentation did not reflect the standard I am accustomed to from a fast food restaurant in the Ballantyne area. Beware of the playground area! Lesson learned!

9Wcgn_Q67IA9Y2DV02OQZw.text: Ok so it's McD's.... What I absolutely can't stand is the fact that's it's the only one that I've been to where they only accept cash. Stop being lazy and do the damn card machine! I mean seriously who carries cash anymore?! And how do u not put cheese on a CHEESEburger?!

58a-QSlqiVkHI8gN3_YXpQ.text: I wanted to review this place just because it tends to me a bit more unique than the typical McPoison's.  The 4 stars are simply for three reasons and three reasons, only.  Firstly, its location.  It's in a great location and is the only McDonald's directly south of I485.  Secondly, the restaurant is always very well maintained and feels clean, and lastly, the playground.  This location has a great kids play area, especially compared to other McDonald's locations; I've never seen one quite like it.  It has a lot of different  activities on the climbing area alone ranging from ropes to spinners to climbing nets.  It and also has a few other activities such as interactive video games where the child stands on a skateboard and manipulates the game --they're actually get to do some fun physical activity after eating their 700+ calorie lunch.  It also has a similar type device but is a racing game.  As well as the video games, it also has a couple of lower areas where very young children can play if they aren't able to climb on the taller activities.  They even have a fully-netted mini trampoline which is also great for kids.  I really like the seating area where the play area is, too.  Unlike most locations, the one's which may have two tables, this has more like 16 tables so more than two families can site and watch their kids pickup virus' which their body isn't immune to yet.  One downside to this location being as it's the one around here is that the drive-through line can get quite lengthy; though it does go quickly.  It kills me to rate a McDonald's 4 stars, but based on the three factors I mentioned above I feel it deserves it.  The food itself going without saying --its crap*  :)  * OK, my disclaimer to that is that their coffee, chocolate Mocha, and milkshakes are actually pretty good --they get half a star for those items...

hkjSA5Ne8LF_ZzwD3586Wg.text: Horrible, I asked if a could add a large drink and the man at the drive through said " Add it on at the 2nd window", in a rude way. Then we had to wait 14 minutes just for two four piece chicken nuggets we ordered since they only rang up one. So we pulled off and  they didn't give us any sauces, so we went back and got them. When we opened it up and they had given us the habanero ranch. Strange the woman in jeans and a black shirt "no uniform?" missed it. Needless to say the 5 and 9 y/o that they were for couldn't eat that. You would expect better on this side of town. Tip: "Don't waste your time and money here!" Ps, don't miss the current 93 sanitation rating from this February!

S1DeCjenEOd44hh_Rlt07w.text: Literally ZERO stars. Stopped by today about 1pm to grab a coffee and the service in the drive through was extremely disgusting. The "boy" actually said to me "YEAH?" When I ordered ! I get to the window and was looked at, provided my coffee and ZERO salutations! I felt I was intruding on "their" time! Always the same low low standards!

HIUCyktQ1T-5juzkYrzhpw.text: I cannot tell you how many times I have given this store a chance to straighten up but no more!  Once again, today,  I went there with a simple order and was shorted a burger.  It is always something missing. The ticket is correct but the bag never has the correct contents.  You call the manager and "we will make it right just come back and come inside for your replacement".  Like I have nothing better to do than go to a Fast Food Joint twice to get my order right.  I wish they would shut their doors and we would get another Fast Food restaurant in its place because the location is so convenient. They outta fire the lot of them including the Manager!

4I4gb6vo1Ao0bDM5xrniFw.text: Worst mcdo i have ever been to. Too slow.waited more than 30 mins for my order when it is NOT busy at all. Told crew about a wet floor and nobody cared. After 30 mins manager started cleaning tables and told him about the wet floor. He snapped ay me telling me their day is rough today with his eyes rolled up and an attitude. When i was so nice and just concern about someone slipping and them getting a case on the court for that. They have to totally re hire  NEW crews and a new manager.

AhqLS4qj881D5HhQtkvw0g.text: this man told me not to make jokes and to keep driving through the drive through. didn't even get served. hoe

gMdM1gDvRDb6YEK_jTethg.text: Horrible experience whoever invested in this business run to it and tend to it please I have been to other McDonalds they have been fine nothing crazy amazing or crazy bad but this one was definitely bad I understand they close this one down at 10 or 9 the guy who worked there didn't even know when they closed but somewhere in that time range and we arrived there at 7:15 to take our lil boy to play in the play area and to get a soft serve ice cream the guy walks in 5 minutes after we get there to tell us it is closed and I asked him if he could atleast play 15 minutes he bluntly said no literally all I was asking was 15 minutes for my child and it was not like the play area was in bad conditions

K8Y-cED7y2aIP_DmulmiAA.text: As this is a Mcd's, Even with a one-star rating, I'll probably return. The rating is for the service. I have NEVER received the correct order in the drive-thru; ALWAYS check your order before pulling off. I have to say that my guess is that this occurs is due to no one being a native English speaker in the establishment. Just a hunch.....

_lNxmtwXyFEgayeB1hLClg.text: I can't argue with anything the other reviewers have said. There are two comments I want to make, one positive, one negative.   First, the good: This is the only McD's I have been to that has electrical outlets in the dining area where I can get a booth and plug in my laptop. This is convenient as I am often stuck in south Charlotte for several hours and need a place to kill time and search job listings, etc. This is why I gave two stars instead of one.  The bad: The cleanliness of the rest rooms (at least the men's room) leaves much to be desired, even for a McDonald's. I get the impression that all of the employees are hoping that someone else will attend to it.  As for the food, well, it's McDonalds, so what can I say. I usually get a drink and, if anything, maybe an apple pie.

bztn8OTjAcJr5p0cCFI5MA.text: As MCD's go, this one is deluxe!  For families, the indoor play area is 3 times the size you normally find, and appears quite clean.  Also, plenty of seating, even booths right inside the play area. The food is what you would expect, but the decor is quite nice -- even a stone gas log fireplace. Lastly, an employee went out of her way to find the Puss in Boots toy my daughter really wanted even though it wasn't the toy of the week.  Nice customer service!

faINAMEkPcRa5TLBcju3Lg.text: This has happened to me too many times so I felt the need to put them on blast. Went through the drive-thru and when I got home the order was not right. There's nothing worse than being hella hungry and finding your food to be not what you wanted! How f-ing hard is it to read an order and make it correctly. This is the last time I will be forced to eat something I didn't want. Drive-thru customers beware!!  Check your order-inside and out-before you leave.

Inh84SD0JodPf1Vc2k8G8Q.text: They have some of the dumbest employees, quite possibly of any fast food establishment.  To time and again get orders wrong is just ridiculous at this point. They take the order correctly, because the receipt says what is ordered, the receipt they even place on the sandwich is correct (i.e. no cheese) yet each time cheese somehow makes it onto the sandwich...

67uH1SZADooQq3mUnFgGAg.text: This is my first time visiting McDonald's located on Rea Road in Charlotte, North Carolina. This place is very clean and in great location in the shopping Center. The clerks are efficient and work quickly to get your order. I am disturbed by customers who use the app on the phone to make an order then are impatient because the data didn't come in before they walked in, so the waitress couldn't process the order. This customer walked out, leaving the order. She was the rude one!! I am completely satisfied with the service I received at this location.

_0uq4yQRgt0sGmRJ5EWbMw.text: Rude drive thru service on Sunday 1/22 and I found a hair fried into my cold chicken nuggets and cold fries. Not coming back here

emVbLDN9SEp3XrVq5qOZJw.text: Been through this drive thru three times in the past two weeks specifically because I wanted a Shamrock Shake. Every time I've been told that the shake machine/ice cream machine is not working. It's a little ridiculous at this point.

w6ogO6-lo5X_iFEYAju4Kw.text: I've submitted this same complaint on McDonalds website, but I feel that others need to know about my experience there.  My breakfast this morning was so nasty, I spit it out. My coffee was absolutely undrinkable (I couldn't keep it in my mouth long enough to determine what was wrong). My egg and cheese biscuit tasted like cleaner and plastic chemicals. It was absolutely the most disgusting thing I've ever tasted.  I honestly don't know why we continue to go to this location. It used to be good, but every time we go now, it's subpar.

jV9TE4u-CO7pba6M102zSA.text: Everyone should try this place. You walk up to a counter, there's a huge menu on the wall staring at you. Then all you need to do is tell the person what you want, pay, and they bring it out to you in like 5 minutes. It's really great. It's good food, not very expensive. There should be more places like this.

wk0blwQn84Cp0U6aHkSlUg.text: If you are going to be open 24 hours, then be ready for the late crew after midnight and have burgers waiting for 2hours so we  don't have 2 wait for 30 minutes for fast food

RmgbQh0GAv1zA8a8pi66JQ.text: Tonight the good folks at Chez McDonaldos stooped to a new low. They created a new dish: Extra Salted Potato Stick Like Things. Good thing I have plenty of blood pressure meds. Wow!

photos.caption: Photo of McDonald's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Salt with some fries

EmBYlC6GunNNAlGefqIKBg.text: This is not a good McDonald's. You need to check and triple check your orders everytime.   Staff working the drive thru don't care if they get your order right or not.  Last three times they tried to stick me with the order of the person behind me and seemed miffed that I wanted what I ordered and not a diet coke.  Which brings me to another complaint.  Drinks, apparently they are optional these days when you order a meal.   Guy at the pickup forgets to hand off the drinks about every time and looks bewildered and upset that your still sitting in the drive thru line waiting for the drink he is supposed to give you.  Chick Fil A down the street seems to have it together don't know why running a fast food restaurant is so difficult these days.

TNgohdr00n5oMg8-vTTlig.text: Longest drive thru in the history of my life for two cups of coffee. I was also asked if I'd like my ICED coffee hot or cold. What? Lol.

idyVNa0dfENzjg7lnfOCgQ.text: Insanely slow! Woman just complained that they need to get it together because she was waiting for 19 minutes and I've now been waiting 20 minutes for a double cheese and medium fry only! Cars are lined up after the drive thru, there's a girl who works here just walking around and their sanitation score is a 90... like the lady said "they need to get it together".

u51WX-lQmkqBTabTU8q4uQ.text: Worst McDonald's ever. Does not honor coupons the way that they are printed. They let a mentally handicapped guy handle the customers when they are crowded and he argues with you about your order.

WlP1xkWjjsDmfH416LuYLg.text: should add after I put my previous review  for McDonald's I took my tray up front and let the person who look like to be the manager see it I Did not do that to get rewarded but hoped for I am sorry . I got some more drink after I inspected my cup for no fly!!!!!  left and still did not get an apology . Amazing they had plenty of time     but not a word. That's all .

hAJqdqO0BCTN_ESXjdZpgQ.text: This may have been the worst food  establishment and quality I've experienced. It is understood it is McDonalds and a certain level of expectations should be held. The odor throughout the building had a very distinct sewage resemblance causing me To have waves of nausea throughout dinner.  I do a lot of travel to 3rd world countries and feel I can hold my own, but given the location of this McDonalds and the clientele it is trying to server, I would of expected this more in a country that has much less sanitation requirements.  I would strongly recommend that HQ or regional management get involved or you could consider this place closed in the near future.  This place just convinced me of my "Last McDonald Supper".  You'll always live in my childhood memories. It's been real!

0NSNbl3xfIVC5xPUvAzblQ.text: This place is a dump! Waited forever for our food, no ketchup, trash cans over flowing. Floors were disgusting!  Will be calling their corporate offices!

nkglciqU3CXg__H0rWInNA.text: This McDonald's doesn't fail to disappoint. It smells, the workers are depressed and awkward. I ordered a sandwich with no bread and the cashier said "oooooookay..."  and then we waited 15 minutes for our order. This is just today, many times we have had wrong orders, rude service, etc.

Ycv6ZP8VEKQyh-yRmv0aEA.text: This location never gets my drive thru orders right. Today the person cut me off as I was giving my order. I asked if she heard what said. Her response was yes. Of course my order was not right at the window. Then I had to wait while the rest of my food got cold. I would much rather drive to the Indian Land location. I you think as busy as this location is they would try to make an improvement. If I could have given no stars I would have.

n_SG49GqOk1n2Ej5EuMGYw.text: I must be a glutton for punishment. Slow service and place dirty. Fast food is a misnomer! Service is atrocious and they were not busy!

yipnFfDQaVlB93SLBhKoCQ.text: McDonalds or McDowells? This place is horrible. They have certain McDonald standards that were met...fries were okay, HI-C was the same and the cups looked like McDonalds cups. Other than that this place was a disappointment. Seemed to be understaffed, the staff there looked messy (all in different ratty tshirts) and the place was a mess!! The only reason we were there is because of the playground. Having to leave the house for 2 house for a house showing will force many parents with 3 kids 6 and under to make a deal with the devil. My devil was McDonalds. As a consumer I assume that all McDonalds make tons of cash...especially ones in crowded locations like this one. I can't image this place is doing that well. Avoid this place if possible!!   If you are reading this and either own or manage this location please do the world a favor and find a new line of work. If you want to stay in the fast food business may I recommend driving across the street or down the road to one of the Chic-fil-as. They always seem busy YET appropriately staffed, well dressed in the same uniform, polite, attentive, and eager to please.

Cj85DKowAtHw_C-u5fK70A.text: This is by far the worst McDonald's in the area. I live 5 minutes from the store and work across the street from it. So I try not to eat there due to the terrible service and cold food. Thought they would get better when they were bought out by individual owner instead of corporate location but no they are worst. Went through drive through tonight for first time in months. Asked for a Mac , tenders meal and a mcchicken. After seeing the order screen notice the  Mac Jr was not on order I asked if it was on order  they said she had it on there. So I continued after waiting for 20 minutes to get to pay window keep in mind had 4 cars in front of me and no one inside store it took 20 minutes to just get to the pay window. I got to pay window they have my food waiting cold of course and hand it to me in the pay window. Of course the Mac Jr they said was on order was not in bag and the fries tasted like they were sitting for the whole 20 minutes I was waiting. Upon going back into store to correct their error they continued to charge me for the Mac Jr they never put on my order AND ANOTHER ORDER OF FRIES so I ended up getting charged for two cold orders of fries. I repeat do not go to this McDonald's ever they have not gotten better and should just shut the location down. I would suggest going to the new one opening on providence and Audrey Kell but guess what same owner owns them both guess McDonald's is never getting my business again. DO NOT GO HERE EVER

SeJfWNsPfU-q459EkwcYxQ.text: This place was top notch when it opened. Now it's disgusting. All the trash cans are full and have trash spilling out of them. Someone started sweeping then quit half way through so there is little piles of trash all over the floor. Everything is sticking and disgusting looking. Almost afraid to touch anything. And if the front looks like that you gotta wonder what it looks like where they cook the food.

iWInZNZLxdnn34RamcPGHw.text: Messed up my order, and when I took the sandwich back to the counter to get it corrected I got an eye roll from the cashier, and an indifferent ok from another girl.  MCDs needs to teach their help some customer service skills like at Chick-fil-A.

KhzZSWz23IvRmUN0gIhk0Q.text: After vowing to never return to this location of McDonald's, I was starving so I went through the drive-thru for a filet and a large fry to take home to eat. Here's the list of what went wrong:  1.  I had to repeat my 2 item order 8 times 2.  I was second to have the honor of the opportunity to eat my filet bun as it appears the resident mice had first dibs (I tossed the sandwich) 3. The fries were old 4. The fries were scant (a medium sized amount of fries in a large container) 5.  The fries were hard  6.  I spoke to Teresa the manager who DGAF 7.  I spoke to Josh Ranst the GM at 919-607-0168 who gave even less of AF than Teresa. He yelled, was curt, rude, unapologetic (until I pointed out he had not apologized), had MUCH attitude, and told me there was nothing he could do since he wasn't there when the food was made.  8. They deserve ZERO stars.  9.  I don't see good things ahead for Ranst or this location.

2upE_ZCb1ixHEymJK3kyxg.text: Rude lady at the window told us we couldn't order at the window so she made us drive through the entire drive thru even though there was absolutely NO LINE. She continued to make us sit in the drive thru for 5 more minutes, AGAIN no line. asked for her name and she refused.  And when we get to the window laughed with a co worker instead of helping us out so obviously we were going to be frustrated.  And continued to call us a liar in front of the manager.  And continued to give us a problem. She was the only staff that wasn't manager at the window at 12:14am on July 4th, 2019, Thursday. We have had several of our family members work here so we know the store owner. Manager was afraid to give us her name so he said it very quietly.  By the way her name was Lil.  We will be calling the store owner in the  Came again last night and waited over 22 minutes to order , things need to change and staff at night needs to get better.  If you don't like working at night here, GET A NEW JOB.

tVrq_sbma9ZCzp1Kxt5d0A.text: Surprise, Surprise...no ice cream. I wonder if, with the technology that exists today, McDonalds could figure out a machine that could serve ice cream more than 3 days a month. I know that seems lofty, but I have faith in them.

owaN-YaOB5qvH4wN0Ekfdw.text: So, as the old saying goes, all is well that ends well... That being said, I went to get a sausage biscuit because I am heading into work, as I work in the next parking lot over. I forgot to order my water with no ice the first time I went through the drive-through so I proceeded to go through the drive-through again. Upon my second time going through drive-through, I was greeted, and then when I asked for the water with no ice I kind of got a grungy response from the young lady. So this would have been a four star review but my return visit was pretty shitty and technically even though I did not pay for the water with no ice, I am still a customer. #GoodDay

Photo of McDonald's - Charlotte, NC, United States
Photo of McDonald's - Charlotte, NC, United States

bji3nj0qzy48K5vv65W5_w.text: Out of soda!  Sorry but that is a staple and destination item. I'll be changing my shopping route moving forward.

p0CHh0H8VvQLi96bBx2bYA.text: Says it's open 24 hours ummm just left there at 210am n it's closed.  Really?! If you aren't open then don't advertise that you are.

PZZqwkafpKi_4p40rtaNWA.text: Just drove through and their system is supposedly down. Hope that's not a cheap way of getting out of work...

vlcLoj7OXpMxDUMpQgwYJQ.text: I ordered 2 plain cheeseburgers on 7-10-19 at 5:25 at the drive through. I asked again at the window if they were plain. I was assured by the employee they were plain. I began to drive off without checking and bit into a cheeseburger filled with ketchup and mustard. Yuck!! I'm sure they aren't used to people coming back when they made a mistake. She seemed irritated. The other lady inside threw it away in front of me. I then was apologized to and given 2 plain cheeseburgers with cheese burgers the cheese cold as if just taken out of the refrigerator. The window employee looked at me like I was being a picky pain in the neck. I left the burgers there. Not willing to get into an argument over cheeseburgers. I'm on the way to Taco Bell. If you order food in the drive through, check it first.

fALHdiFR4oDuE23z7adBNw.text: Love the renovation. The play equipment, as typical of all McD playgrounds, is predictably dirty and gross. But the layout of the restaurant is good. The family play area is perfectly separated. The ordering stations are great because I can customize to my heart's content without feeling guilty. The food is always delivered quickly. I'm a fan.

photos.caption: Photo of McDonald's - Charlotte, NC, United States

FKzwD3X1lufvnKm6ErV11g.text: Ok, first of all, they are playing Van Halens Eruption....W.T.F.  they can now burn my coffee and they would still get 5 stars!!!  New location and we decided to have our coffee /iced tea here vs the buck.  Glad we did.  Any place that plays Van Halen is awesome in my book!   Exterior is mondern clean, and the interior continues the modern motif with cool decor and clean lines from the order counter to the table with the changing colored lights.   The coffee was fresh and hot and the tea was great.  No play house at this location however so if you have youngins and hope for a play area, not available here at Waverly location.  Great location and fast friendly service.

photos.caption: Photo of McDonald's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Cool table that changes color
Photo of McDonald's - Charlotte, NC, United States. My love, and the fountain drinks
Photo of McDonald's - Charlotte, NC, United States. Cool dining

C-_97QBw5GfXT-gNREhuFg.text: HORRIBLE customer service!!!! I waited in line and watched three people order at the other drive through and sat there. The worker told me to hold on twice as I listened to ear laugh and talk with her coworker and not take my order. When I told her I had been waiting she responded with "its only been two minutes"  REALLY?????? Get control of your workers and teach them to WORK!!!!! NEVR COMINF BACK!!! AWFUL SERVICE!!!!!!

kVuMveK3i2SpML-Wk9SHcQ.text: I have to udoate my review. This has got to be the worst McDonald's I've ever been to and its in a good area. Well great area. Service is slow! On multiple occasions I've gotten a hamburger with no burger meat inside. And multiple other issues. Worst part? They get $15 an hour and are asking for more!

1LKcxD8PVgeLP_Dn524sew.text: Worst McDonald's in South Charlotte. Service is bad and super slow. Located in a nice area but you wouldn't know once you're inside. A guy literally came from the drive thru and cursed the staff out cause they couldn't get 4 cars out in a timely fashion. Said he would fire everyone in here starting with the manager. Sadly, I had to agree.

JAokhHZRs4JNTBH2UNv6fA.text: as usual ice cream machine broken I've been to the store three times in the last three months and every time the ice cream machine is broken I don't know the moron is the ownership or the management which are losing all the business because your ice cream machine doesn't work you idiots

5wx0op8nR9eThW6ur4Cx8A.text: I told myself I wouldn't come back to this McDonalds again and for some reason I did today. This his historically one of the worst and slowest locations that I know of. We placed a mobile order and we arrived 10 mins later. When we arrived we went in and literally there are so many people waiting on orders that we had difficulty finding a spot to stand. Someone told me they were waiting 40 mins. After we waited 15 mins I asked for a refund. The manager told another employee she wasn't going to issue any more refunds as she already did 30 today (this is at 12:30pm). Another employee stepped up and issued my refund.  Horrible service. I can't understand why management hasn't been replaced at this busy location.

iTFfSFj5oT2Jkx5Z9hf6KQ.text: The manager called us "bitches" and said we were "playing" while we were just trying to get our order straight. There was alot of people in the car and we were just trying to figure things out. Will never come to this location again

AqpSyyP26-cHTJgkLxHjtg.text: I usually don't post reviews, but this McDonald's needs to clean house. I have never experienced customer service AND food of this low of quality! I literally waited in line for 30 minutes, while it wasn't even busy. The manager, Debra, really needs to learn how customer service works... and for the owner: fix the sanitation score.  The manager talked smack about the customer in front of me, and had the audacity to try to prove me wrong, saying I didn't even wait that long.   Also, the rude girl that gave me my food, dangled my drink in front of me, saying "ooooh you're gonna have to pay" (when the customer in front me got her food for no cost)   If you can't own up to your mistakes, and you can't practice good customer service... good luck in the real world, young lady.

oyktht29zI85SsHh_-WtlA.text: I wish I could give this McDonalds NEGATIVE 5 stars! at 9 pm at night, the second drive through window was closed, and it took me FORTY FIVE MINUTES to get to the window. Multiple people turned around and either left or went inside the store (I presume), but I couldn't, as I was wearing my jammies and bunny slippers. I ordered a big Mac and a french fry, which I specified to please be hot (the last two times nothing inn my order was even warm). I get out of the line and I am driving home, and I realized that, yes, the fries were hot- but they were less than half full! And none spilled into the bag! My one burger patty was tiny on the bun,almost no big mac sauce on the burger and, NO receipt. I have complained to McDonald's before, and they have never offered a coupon or anything for their cold food (or missing burgers, which has happened also before here). Even though it is inconvenient, I'm going up the road to Wendy's from here on out. I have had too many bad experiences with his McDonald's to ever visit them again at Blakeney. 45 minutes in a line for a freaking hamburger- this is fast food? And you can't even give the clients their correct order? You guys need a full management makeover and employees who can at least learn to fill up a fry bag!

LeyesNj-KwA5lAog2AKJDg.text: I love McDonald's breakfast. I always get a chicken biscuit. But replace the biscuit with a mcgriddle. Came here and was told I'd have to buy a mcgriddle separate for the up charge on replacing the bread. Never had that happen before. Now I know don't come here and drive the extra 10 miles to my normal spot. Left hungry and angry
